name: Space Jerks
description:
You were having a nice day flying through an asteroid field when a bunch of space gremlins decided to sneak onboard and start messing with the controls.  Dodge asteroids and rescue stranded astronauts while repairing the damage done by those little jerks.

Controls:

Mouse to click buttons, and drag them back into place when the inevitably get removed.

Escape to quit.

Scoring:

Astronauts: 500 points (-100 if shot)

Asteroids: 100-300 points

Gameplay by Glagha

All art by Jexebele
